pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 9, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10 a.m.    The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2 p.m.     The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3 p.m.     The Prime Minister will attend a ceremony to pay tribute to Olympic and Paralympic athletes in the House of Commons.

3:30 p.m.The Prime Minister will attend a reception for Olympic and Paralympic athletes and deliver remarks.

Reading Room (237-C)
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note to media:

    • Open coverage
